commentBody:
Four years of News Coverage of this stuffed shirt? It is enough to give one kittens, and a friend in New York sabotaged my weekend by suggesting that Trump is going to be hanging around far longer.

Glad to hear that Mayor Bill de Blasio is getting some credit for his hard work. Contrary to what some of us may feel, or understand, this is not a weak individual who spends time worrying about his tennis scores. This could be a good match for the most extraordinary State Capital City in the world.

In the meantime, London Bridge is not falling down, but it is unlikely that the Office who handles Trump's administrative affairs is going have the smarties to send a note of courtesy to the British Prime Minister, or the darling buds of May.

Thank you, Ms. Collins, for this latest weather political update, and on a side note, I have racked up enough food points at the local supermarket to get a free turkey. I offered it to my elderly aunt, but she told me that it would choke her in view of what is happening in our Country, and has expressed a wish to watch instead 'The Crown'. Give it the Brits to keep us informed and entertained.
